name: Blue Dream
description: A potent cross between Blueberry and Haze, Blue Dream balances full-body relaxation with gentle cerebral invigoration.

name: Granddaddy Purple
description: Famous for its deep purple bloom, this strain is a staple for those seeking deep relaxation and sleep aid.

name: Jack Herer
description: Named after the cannabis activist, this strain captures both cerebral elevation and heavy resin production.

name: OG Kush
description: The backbone of West Coast cannabis varieties, OG Kush is cherished for its ability to crush stress under the weight of its heavy euphoria.
